title: League Stops Updating Suddenly?
body:
I downloaded League on to a HDD, Windows 10 (Boot Camp on Mac). Installing the client works fine, but as I'm patching from the client, once the client patches up to 35%, it just closes on its own. No crash or error report window opens after.

I have about 7 GB of space on my Boot Camp partition, but about 300 GB space on my HDD.
What can I do to install league properly?

replies.body:
Oh snap, I was running League in the same way with a Window's partitioned Mac for awhile too! Awkward high-five!

So, it's really weird that the patcher is just closing without any crash or error message at all. It kinda seems like this might be some kind of permissions issue so check out the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) first, but also make sure you go through this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well. Let me know if this doesn't help at all!
